short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a new inspiring quote every day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start your day with a daily dose of inspiration! This Chrome extension delivers a handpicked collection of uplifting and motivational quotes right to your browser's new tab. Be inspired by renowned personalities and ignite your inner drive to achieve greatness. Stay motivated and focused on your goals with a new inspiring quote every day.
